hero.title: Web Developer & Creative Coder
hero.description: I create beautiful and efficient web experiences, turning ideas into reality with clean code and elegant design.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A little information about myself
about.introductionText: Hello! I'm a Web Developer with a passion for creating high-quality web products. With over 1 year of experience in the industry, I've had the opportunity to work on diverse projects, from corporate websites to complex web applications.
about.introductionText2: I'm always seeking new challenges and opportunities to learn modern technologies. My goal is to create products that are not only beautiful but also provide the best user experience.
about.philosophyText: "Clean code is code that is easy to read, maintain, and extend. I believe every line of code should have a clear purpose and bring real value to users."

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's connect and work together
contact.infoText: I'm always ready to listen to new projects, creative ideas, or collaboration opportunities. Please contact me!
contact.name: Full Name
contact.successMessage: Thank you for contacting me! This is a demo form.

footer.description: Web Developer passionate about creating beautiful and efficient web products.
